archimate:Requirement.name: SD.2.9.3c: c) key performance indicators (KPIs) have been used to report the effectiveness of security approaches used in development (e.g. the adoption of security techniques; the number of approved deviations from security policy; the reduction in overall number and severity of security vulnerabilities; and the cost of security breaches caused by vulnerabilities in the application)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
